TopicTitle: Dres Rings Not Visible In Flight View [Dres Rings Lighting Issue]

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 Home 22H2 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D | GPU: MSI Gaming GeForce RTX 4080 16GB GDDR6X PCI Express 4.0 | RAM: 128 GB DDR5-6000

 

What happened:
I have crossed through the rings on a slight incline and even tried to match them as best I can in map view, but at no point in the orbit do I actually see anything in flight view. This kind of robs us of an exploration opportunity and there should be a special flight situation for it as well.

What was expected:
Lots of tiny space dust, or maybe even small asteroids. Something colorful and reflecting sun light like you see it in the map. Something with a 3D appearance, as the map shows a 2D texture.

 

Included Attachments:

Edited January 14 by Spicat

You can see them at certain angles in the flight view. They can be seen as a black line across the sky that blocks stars behind, when looking at the rings edge-on.

I totally agree it's very subtle compared to how clear they are in the map view.

Probably a bug - they must have been intended to be more visible.
the workaround for this is restarting the game.
